00066        class RefCountBase: public TPointerBase<Type>
00067        {
00068        public:
00069               typedef TPointerBase<Type> BaseClass;
00070 
00071               RefCountBase(Type* pointer)
00072               :      BaseClass(pointer)

00074                      I_ASSERT(pointer != NULL);
00075               }
00076               virtual ~RefCountBase(){}
00077 
00078               // abstract methods
00082               virtual void OnAttached() = 0;
00086               virtual void OnDetached() = 0;
00087        };

00106 template <class Type>
00107 TTransPtr<Type>::TTransPtr(const TTransPtr& pointer)
00108 :      m_counterPtr(pointer.m_counterPtr)
00109 {
00110        const_cast<TTransPtr&>(pointer).m_counterPtr = NULL;
00111 }
00112

00114 template <class Type>

00121 template <class Type>
00122 bool TTransPtr<Type>::IsValid() const
00123 {
00124        return (m_counterPtr != NULL) && (m_counterPtr->GetPtr() != NULL);
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 template <class Type>
00129 inline const Type* TTransPtr<Type>::GetPtr() const
00130 {
00131        if (m_counterPtr != NULL){
00132               return m_counterPtr->GetPtr();
00133        }
00134        else{
00135               return NULL;
00136        }
00137 }

00152 template <class Type>
00153 void TTransPtr<Type>::Reset()
00154 {
00155        Detach();
00156 
00157        m_counterPtr = NULL;
00158 }

00161 template <class Type>
00162 TTransPtr<Type>& TTransPtr<Type>::operator=(TTransPtr& pointer)
00163 {
00164        Detach();
00165 
00166        m_counterPtr = pointer.m_counterPtr;
00167 
00168        pointer.m_counterPtr = NULL;
00169 
00170        return *this;
00171 }

00174 template <class Type>
00175 inline Type& TTransPtr<Type>::operator*() const
00176 {
00177        I_ASSERT(m_counterPtr != NULL);
00178        I_ASSERT(m_counterPtr->GetPtr() != NULL);
00179 
00180        return *m_counterPtr->GetPtr();

00182

00184 template <class Type>
00185 inline Type* TTransPtr<Type>::operator->() const
00186 {
00187        I_ASSERT(m_counterPtr != NULL);
00188        I_ASSERT(m_counterPtr->GetPtr() != NULL);

00202 template <class Type>
00203 inline void TTransPtr<Type>::Detach()
00204 {

00206               m_counterPtr->OnDetached();
00207        }
00208 }
